com.microsoft.bingads.v10.bulk.entities

Class BulkTextAd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.bingads.v10.internal.bulk.BulkObject
      • com.microsoft.bingads.v10.bulk.entities.BulkEntity
        • com.microsoft.bingads.v10.internal.bulk.entities.SingleRecordBulkEntity
          • com.microsoft.bingads.v10.bulk.entities.BulkTextAd

  • public class BulkTextAd
extends SingleRecordBulkEntity
    Represents a text ad. This class exposes the setTextAd(com.microsoft.bingads.v10.campaignmanagement.TextAd) and getTextAd() methods that can be used to read and write fields of the Text Ad record in a bulk file.

    For more information, see Text Ad at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=620263

    See Also:
    BulkServiceManager, BulkOperation, BulkFileReader, BulkFileWriter
